# [Interview #243: KOD Signing Report - Hermano de lobos, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=243#1)

#### Hermano de lobos

I just got back from the book signing for
*Knife of Dreams*
in Santa Cruz, CA. It was basically the same old same old.
